text: Man's Favorite Sport? is a 1964 American romantic comedy movie directed by Howard Hawks and starring Rock Hudson, Paula Prentiss, Maria Perschy, Charlene Holt, John McGiver, Roscoe Karns, Norman Alden, Forrest Lewis. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1964 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks Category:Movies set in San Francisco
title: Man's Favorite Sport?
